document.full_text: libyan forces loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi have been firing into residential neighborhoods in misurata with a weapon that has been banned by much of the world, witnesses say.
document.title: qaddafi troops fire cluster bombs into civilian areas
lines_and_colors: libyan forces loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi have been firing into residential neighborhoods in misurata with a weapon that has been banned by much of the world, witnesses say.
